dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3274188V] livejasmin.in infringment of copyrights
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, February 28, 2007 9:13 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3274188V] livejasmin.in infringment of copyrights ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. livejasmin.in infringment of copyrights Added by system at Wednesday, Feb 28 2007 03:13 pm X-MailFrom: webmaster@nnrealm.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_00FC_01C75B85.9953C350" X-Priority: 3 X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.3028 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: webmaster@nnrealm.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 28 Feb 2007 21:12:58.0108 (UTC) FILETIME=[388BE3C0:01C75B7D] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Hello Shut down www.livejasmin.in he is scraping my content , hotlinking my stuff . I will sue him and you in 2 days if I dont see him shutted down or my cantent deleted from that blog. This already happened , and I m quite happy all the times I can have some one like him shutted down , or sue some one that violate internation copyrights laws. Enjoy. MIME element (text/html)
Hello
 
Shut down www.livejasmin.in he is scraping my content , hotlinking my stuff . I will sue him and you in 2 days if I dont see him shutted down or my cantent deleted from that blog.  This already happened , and I m quite happy all the times I can have some one like him shutted down , or sue some one that violate internation copyrights laws. Enjoy.
MIME element (text/plain)
